Html:
Hi all

(Sorry about the barrage of question which it seems just radioman is answering... But thank you radioman :) )

The GMapControl has a OnMarkerClicked event. Am I correct in thinking that I can't remove a marker from this delegate? I don't believe I can get to the GMapoverlay from the GMapMarker because it's internal. Is there an easy way I can determine which overlay I am on, and which set of items (polygons, markers etc) I need to remove the item from?

Thanks
